There will be no description when there is no
, there are two ways to configure the node: Configure it when instantiating a Graph globally; Configure it in the data.

children.value: 1 Global Configure When Instantiating a Graph
To configure different nodes with different properties, you can write the properties into the node data.
are available for ModelRect node, some special properties are shown below. The property with Object type will be described after the table:
The size of the modelRect node
The default style of modelRect node
Correspond to the styles in Canvas

// The configuration of the state icon in the node
// Whether to show the icon. false means hide the icon
// Adjust the left/right offset of the icon
